name: places/ChIJbXFjcLlYwokRsYegoItlp2E
adrFormatAddress: 1583 1st Ave., New York, NY 10028, USA

originalText.text: Very happy to write a review after such a great experience with Little Wolf Cabinet Shop. From the time I just walked into the shop on a whim to ask about building a cabinet for my apartment to the installation last week, John and his staff were professional, friendly and responsive. My new cabinet looks great and like it was a part of this apartment from the beginning. Changes the whole look of my apartment for the better. We had a few challenges trying to match my old base and ceiling molding and John was extremely accommodating. We found it eventually and it all worked out without even a slight delay. I highly recommend Little Wolf if you are looking for cabinets of any type!

originalText.text: What can I say? I wish I could give them 10 stars! They are truly amazing!!! One of the most professional businesses that I've had the pleasure to work with. The Wolf's have done cabinetry both at my home and my office. We've been dealing with them for almost 20 years now. Very honest, professional, reasonable and most important, timely. They always stand by their work and now even almost 20 years later occasionally come by to do some minor adjustments due to daily wear and tear. I can't say enough good things about them. It's a family owned and run operation. Their employees have been with them forever and that's a good sign. I am sure they treat their employees well. Every employee is superbly skilled and top notch. I recommend them wholeheartedly.

text.text: What can I say? I wish I could give them 10 stars! They are truly amazing!!! One of the most professional businesses that I've had the pleasure to work with. I recommend them wholeheartedly.

originalText.text:
Little Wolf is one of the finest cabinet makers in the United States.
We bought a 3 bedroom apartment on East End Avenue in New York City and Mr. Wolf is a true gem.  He turned our project into one our most satisfying architectural projects in our lifetime.
Each room had a separate theme, some in mahogany, maple, anigre and poplar with combinations of woods used also.
His initial drawings and creative insights were better than any firm that competed for the project.  More important the finished product in each room was exact, perfect and the work of true artists.
We greatly appreciated the way Mr. Wolf and his son John worked with our marble and granite fabricators to assure that the bar we built and the bathrooms and kitchen areas that used stone we done the right way.
We were given expert advice on who to use for specific finishes of certain woods and everyone he recommended did a very professional job.  We spent 6 figures with Mr. Wolf and it was one of the best investments we made.  His work is truly ART.
Every person we have sent him in Manhattan, South Hampton and Long Island with substantial projects have thanked us for the recommendation.

originalText.text: Highly recommended. I have done a couple of mill work with them. And we just signed in a major contract. They should deliver the first week of September. I will keep you posted.

originalText.text: LW made a home office unit.  Magnificent workmanship, on time, excellent value, Ryan and his team were thoughtful, helpful and a pleasure to work with. Also an excellent value. Would/will use them again in the future.
